title: Quality of nutritional status assessment and its relationship with the effect of rainfall on childhood stunting: a cross-sectional study in rural Burkina Faso
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 234

Author(s): Edmund Yeboah, Julia Lohmann, J.-L. Koulidiati, Naasegnibe Kuunibe, N.N.A. Kyei, S. Hamadou, V. Ridde, I. Danquah, S. Brenner, M. De Allegri
